data.title: The Bee Battles: Karl von Frisch, Adrian Wenner and the Honey Bee Dance Language Controversy
data.meta_description: In 1967, American biologist Adrian Wenner (1928–) launched an extensive challenge to Karl von Frisch’s (1886–1982) theory that bees commu
